description: One of the main heroines. A first-year student at class 1-C, Mina is a member of the school`s swimming team. She loves dolphins and is quite shy. She appeared first in the school library, Aoba helped her reach a book about dolphins. After Aoba agrees to become her coach, she falls in love with him. She is very nervous to confess her true feelings to him. She confesses to Aoba when she finds out he is transferring and waits to hear his answer, he turns her down.
name: Yayoi Mina
